flawed_nl_solution:
When Jerry reads 30 pages on Saturday, he would be remaining with 93-30 = <<93-30=68>>68 pages.
After reading an additional 20 pages on Sunday, he would be remaining with 68 - 20 = <<68-20=48>>48 pages.
#### 48

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 68. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
